snippet: Marin Naidenov Minkov, known as the Patriarch Maxim of Bulgaria, weathered a revolt over his Communist-era ties to lead his country’s Orthodox Christians for more than 40 years.
abstract: Marin Naidenov Minkov, known as the Patriarch Maxim of Bulgaria, dies at age 98.
lead_paragraph: Marin Naidenov Minkov, known as the Patriarch Maxim of Bulgaria, weathered a revolt over his Communist-era ties to lead his country’s Orthodox Christians for more than 40 years.

headline.seo: Patriarch Maxim, Orthodox Leader of Bulgaria, Dies at 98
headline.main: Patriarch Maxim, Orthodox Leader of Bulgaria, Dies at 98
headline.print_headline: Patriarch Maxim, 98, Orthodox Leader of Bulgaria
